name: mdsg
description: Simple markdown site generator for GitHub Pages

scripts.quality: npm run lint && npm run format:check
scripts.quality:fix: npm run lint:fix && npm run format
scripts.ci: npm run quality && npm run test:run && npm run build
scripts.pre-push: npm run quality:fix && npm run test:run
scripts.size: npm run build && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const gzip=require('zlib').gzipSync;const dir='dist/assets';fs.readdirSync(dir).forEach(f=>{const s=fs.statSync(path.join(dir,f));const gz=gzip(fs.readFileSync(path.join(dir,f)));console.log(`${f}: ${(s.size/1024).toFixed(1)}KB (${(gz.length/1024).toFixed(1)}KB gzipped)`);})"
scripts.perf: npm run build && npm run preview & sleep 3 && npx lighthouse http://localhost:3001 --only-categories=performance --chrome-flags='--headless' && pkill -f 'vite preview'
